00020 namespace mt {
00021 
00022 template<class Data> class DataForOrderSafeQueue {
00023 
00024 public:
00025 
00026         DataForOrderSafeQueue() {
00027                 m_state = false;
00028         }
00029 
00030         Data m_data;
00031         bool m_state;
00032 
00033 };
00034 
00035 template<class Data> class OrderSafeQueue {
00036 
00037         std::vector<DataForOrderSafeQueue<Data> > m_queue;
00038         Mutex m_queueMtx;
00039         Mutex m_endMtx;
00040 
00041         uint32_t m_end;
00042         uint32_t m_beg;
00043 
00044         size_t m_size;
00045 
00046         void (*m_overflowCallback)();
00047 
00048         bool isLast(uint32_t i) {
00049 
00050                 if (m_beg > m_end) {
00051                         if (!((i > m_end) && (i< m_beg)))
00052                                 return true;
00053                 } else {
00054                         if ((i > m_beg) && (i<m_end))
00055                                 return true;
00056                 }
00057                 return false;
00058 
00059         }
00060 
00061 public:
00062 
00063         OrderSafeQueue(size_t size = 256) {
00064                 m_size = size;
00065                 m_end = 0;
00066                 m_beg = 0;
00067                 m_queue.resize(m_size);
00068         }
00069 
00070         void enlarge(size_t new_sz) {
00071 
00072                 if(new_sz <= m_size)
00073                         return;
00074 
00075                 AutoMutex a(m_queueMtx);
00076 
00077                 if(m_beg >= m_end){
00078                         m_queue.resize(new_sz);
00079                         m_size = new_sz;
00080                 }else{
00081                         m_queue.resize(new_sz);
00082                         uint32_t new_beg = 0;
00083                         for(size_t i = 0, tmp = 0; i< m_beg; i++){
00084                                 if(i < new_sz - m_size){
00085                                         new_beg = m_size + i;
00086                                         m_queue[new_beg].m_data = m_queue[i].m_data;
00087                                         m_queue[new_beg].m_state = m_queue[i].m_state;
00088                                 }else{
00089                                         new_beg = tmp++;
00090                                         m_queue[new_beg].m_data = m_queue[i].m_data;
00091                                         m_queue[new_beg].m_state = m_queue[i].m_state;
00092                                 }
00093                                 m_queue[i].m_state = false;
00094                         }
00095 
00096                         m_beg = new_beg;
00097                 }
00098 
00099         }
00100 
00101         void push(Data, uint32_t position);
00102         Data pop();
00103 };
00104 
00105 template<class Data> void OrderSafeQueue<Data>::push(Data data, uint32_t sn) {
00106 
00107         m_queueMtx.lock();
00108 
00109         uint32_t pos = sn % m_size;
00110         if(isLast(pos)){
00111                 m_beg = pos;
00112         }
00113         m_queue[pos].m_data = data;
00114         m_queue[pos].m_state = true;
00115 
00116         m_queueMtx.unlock();
00117         m_endMtx.unlock();
00118 }
00119 
00120 template<class Data> Data OrderSafeQueue<Data>::pop() {
00121 
00122         Data ret;
00123         bool run = true;
00124         bool state = false;
00125 
00126         do {
00127                 m_queueMtx.lock();
00128                 if (m_end >= m_size) {
00129                         m_end = 0;
00130                 }
00131 
00132                 ret = m_queue[m_end].m_data;
00133                 state = m_queue[m_end].m_state;
00134                 m_queue[m_end].m_state = false;
00135                 if (state) {
00136                         m_end++;
00137                         run = false;
00138                 }
00139                 m_queueMtx.unlock();
00140 
00141                 if (!state) {
00142                         m_endMtx.lock();
00143                 }
00144 
00145         } while (run);
00146 
00147         return ret;
00148 }
00149 
00150 }
